subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Marcus Ginyard remembers how the North Carolina locker room felt last season when a second-half collapse sent Georgetown to the Final Four and left the Tar Heels wondering what went so wrong.
snippet: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Marcus Ginyard remembers how the North Carolina locker room felt last season when a second-half collapse sent Georgetown to the Final Four and left the Tar Heels wondering what went so wrong.
